name: Snow Rolling
description:
Roll the snowballs, waltz with the snowmen, climb the tinsel, ring the bells, or just chill out in the Christmas snow.

Made in 3 days for the Cozy Winter Jam 2022

How To Play:

Show Help - ? key (Gamepad DPad Up)

Reset Game - Escape (Gamepad Start)

 

Grab/Climb - Tap or hold RMB or LMB (Gamepad RB LB)

Let go - Tap RMB or LMB (Gamepad RB LB)

Let Go All - Ctrl or the (Gamepad X)

 

Go Limp - Hold Shift (Gamepad A)

Jump - Spacebar (Gamepad Y)

 

Camera:

Move Camera - Hold Tab (Gamepad Move L Joystick)

Zoom - ScrollWheel (Gamepad L & R Trigger)

 

Misc:

Tune Radio - Right or left bracket [] (Gamepad Dpad L & R)

Toggle TV Effect - 1 key

Toggle Pixel Effect - 2 key
